name: Park Inn by Radisson Uno City Vienna

reviews.text: We checked into this hotel after a long journey from Kuala Lumpur. It is located just across the street from Vienna International Centre and near U-bahn metro station. There is a supermarket at 5 minutes walk from the hotel. The check in process was fast and we were given a room on the third floor. The room is compact with some modern furnitures and amenities. A coffee making facility is provided in the room so as an ironing facility. The view from our room is nice overlooking UNO City. The bed is comfortable and I have the rest that I needed before moving to our next destination. I wish we could have stayed longer.
reviews.title: Wish could have stayed longer

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is great for a short stay in Vienna. It's slightly out of town in the CBD but with a subway link 3 mins walk for which we never waited for more than one minute we were in the center of things in no more than 15 mins.
reviews.title: New Year Visit

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is quiet and the service was absulutely superb.
reviews.title: Satisfaction

reviews.text: Great breakfast
reviews.title: Great loaction, can use better hotel management

reviews.text: Leaving this hotel after four nights of staying, my wife and myself felt nothing else, but satisfaction. Value for money, near a U1 line metro station( time to Stephanplatz 9 minutes), easy transportation to and from airport(airport bus, line Kagran, 13 euros return), free Wifi, nice breakfast. No safe in room, average housekeeping, very big pillows.
reviews.title: Great croissants

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 1st good point.
reviews.title: trippers dream

reviews.text: Arriving in Vienna fairly late we jumped on the airport bus which we found out about from trip adviser, as was mentioned in that review, the bus dropped us off at the hotel door it only cost 8 euros compared to 40 -45 euros that a taxi would cost.
reviews.title: Good hotel, great staff

reviews.text: 2nd good point
reviews.title: An excellent business hotel

reviews.text: The hotel was very clean and we had a room with a terrace again thanks to trip adviser, great for sitting out in the evening or early morning with a coffee or cool beer, it also catches the sun. A safe, fridge bar, coffee/tea making facilities were also in the room.
reviews.title: I would return becuasse of a breakfast

reviews.text: 3rd good point
reviews.title: Old and not well mantained hotel

reviews.text: Excellent hotel for both business and leisure. Close to U-Bahn and excellent free parking garage. Good breakfast, nice, tidy and large rooms, very pleasant atmosphere. It is in a higher price range, but definitely offers vales for the money. Extremely friendly stuff.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel
Maybe a little too pricey but OK
reviews.text: I'm not sure that this hotel lives up to its 4 star rating but the service was OK and the location was handy to the U Bahn. Breakfast was good. The room we stayed in was a good size but maybe a little noisey as it was road side. All in all OK

When you enter the hotel it strikes you more like a youth hostel but it's actually very reasonable... Rooms are relatively big, internet is free and bathrooms are clean. Breakfast is included and pretty good.
reviews.title: 1st impression may be misleading...

reviews.text: Service is excellent!
reviews.title: Very nice service but needs a refurb

reviews.text: It's located just across from the Vienna Conference Center which makes it very convenient if you have to be at the conference center. It's a bit far from city center but with the U-Bahn it's just a 5 minute ride. The U-Bahn is located across the street from the Park Inn which is very convenient.
reviews.title: Basic hotelLocation no where

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have stayed in this hotel for 4 nights during the New Year 2013. Its location is right next to the Vienna International centre hence the vicinity of a U-Bahn around 5 minutes of walk and 10 minutes to Donau Zentrum which is a huge shopping centre. The U-Bahn stop callled Kaisermuhlen VIC is just 6 stops from the strict centre called Stephansplatz and takes less than 10 minutes. You needn't worry about the transportation as the U-Bahn is always on time and is simple yet works impeccable. The hotel offers a nice lounge at the entrance with free coffee and biscuits, following is the breakfast room. Rooms are pleasant and big enough, offering also a mini fridge, tea kettle and even an ironing board with an iron. Bathrooms are standard. Cleaning staff is quite early with cleaning but they do a great job every time. The only thing in the room I didn't like were the pillows which were too soft and the sound isolation of rooms could be better. The best thing about this hotel is the amazing breakfast. It starts at 6.30 on working days and you can get pretty much everything your heart desires-from croissants, various types of bread, cereals, salads, yoghurts, jams, fruit, juices, teas, eggs, beans, cheeses. The staff is always at hand and ready to help. When I return to Vienna, I would surely pick this hotel again.
reviews.title: Above par hotel with a good location and a great breakfast

reviews.text: Hotel is a service industry. Good service includes security. A hotel with the best service but poor security would expose guests to crime risks and compromise reputation and goodwill.
reviews.title: Security in this hotel is a joke but not the funny kind.
Excellent hotel
reviews.text: This hotel unfortunatly doesn't have any security in place what so ever, even tho service is on high level. There is no control between floors , parking garage or entry to restaurant which is in my opinion "best practice" already around the world.This encourages theft ( which happened to me). i wouldn't recommend this hotel for staying.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is situated just 6 tube stops from the city centre Stephanplatz (7 mins). The airport transfer running from airport to Vienna conveniently stops just outside hotel so getting to this hotel is so conveniently easy, both from airport (€13 for a round trip) as well as to/from the city centre. The rooms are surprisingly very large for a city hotel, with all expected amenities included. Breakfast is great and abundant. Staff are extremely helpful and genuinenly make your stay an extremely pleasant one. Will return to Vienna and will defintiely stay at this hotel.
reviews.title: Very good hotel that could be even better.

reviews.text: The hotel has its pros and cons. On the Pros side is the business center. You can use the computers and printer free of charge. This was very usefull to print boarding passes, directions, etc. Breakfast is also definitely on the Pros side. Many choices with fresh breads, delicious croissants, fresh fruit and yogurt. The staff was friendly and helpful with directions etc. Very close to the underground and convenient to the autobahn. Room was clean and spacious. Another pro is the free parking. On the Cons side is the towels and bed linens that look and are quite worn. The pillows were terrible. Had to use the down comforter as a pillow. The room was too warm for a comforter so I removed the duvet cover to use as a light cover on its own but on the last night of our stay the cover was taken away and not replaced. Should have called housekeeping to ask for one but it was very late. There are no amenities such as slippers, shower caps, sewing kits, etc in the rooms but you can request some items you have forgotten. The hand soap and body soap/shampoo are in dispensers. Two stops aways is a huge shopping mall were you can find whatever you need.
reviews.title: Good value and service

aka: Park Inn By Radisson Uno City, Vienna Hotel
description: Park Inn by Radisson Uno City, Vienna is enviably located in Vienna's largest recreation area on the banks of the Danube. Close to the city centre, our hotel is right next to convention centre and the United Nations, making it convenient for both business and leisure travelers. The underground is just a 3 minute walk away and takes you directly to the city center within 7 minutes. Free Wi-fi is available in the entire hotel. Free Highspeed internet access is available in the entire hotel. Free private parking is available in our garage.
